attributes.action: Scrap new forced contracts on Junior Doctors and Jeremy hunt to step down.
attributes.additional_details: So this petition asks for Jeremy Hunt to step down and the goverment to scrap these forced contracts and go back to renegotiations.
attributes.background: Jeremy Hunt to step down as Health Secretary through lack of confidence from the general public and health professionals. A lot of people support the Junior Doctors and this enforced contract is a step to far.
